contents.text: Thank you for calling Springboard in San Francisco, your partner in future-proofing your career.
For information on our courses and admissions, press 1.
To learn about our full-stack web development program, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a course advisor for full-stack web development.

navigationGoals: Get start dates, tuition fees, and enrollment process for the full-stack web development program
I’m a veteran exploring the full-stack web development program and want to speak with an advisor about enrollment and veteran benefits.
Get a deep dive on the full-stack web development curriculum, tech stack coverage, and enrollment prerequisites.
I need help speaking to an advisor about enrolling in the full-stack web development course.
I’d like to speak with an advisor about the full-stack web development program’s prerequisites, curriculum, and time commitment.

contents.text: To learn about our data science bootcamp, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a course advisor for data science.

navigationGoals: Learn about application deadlines, curriculum details, and payment options for the data science bootcamp
As a veteran, I’d like information on the data science bootcamp curriculum and my GI Bill eligibility.
Inquire about the data science bootcamp’s syllabus, toolchain (Python, TensorFlow), and application requirements.
I’d like to talk to someone about the data science bootcamp and how to sign up.
I need details on the data science bootcamp’s syllabus, project requirements, and overall duration.

contents.text: For student support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support and platform help, press 1.
Thank you for your patience, we are connecting you to technical support now.

navigationGoals: Resolve a login error and get technical assistance with the online learning platform
I need technical assistance logging into the platform and accessing my course materials.
Troubleshoot a platform issue—specifically a Jupyter notebook kernel error or login API authentication failure.
I’m having trouble accessing the learning platform—please connect me with technical support.
I’m encountering a login error on the Springboard platform and need technical support to access my course materials.

contents.text: For career advising and mentor scheduling, press 2.
One moment please, we are connecting you to our career advising team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a career advising session to discuss job transition and mentorship opportunities
I want to schedule a career advising session to plan my transition into a tech role after the program.
Schedule a one-on-one career advising session to refine my technical resume and roadmap for a software engineering role.
I want to schedule a session with a career advisor and mentor for guidance on next steps.
I want to schedule a session with a career advisor to review my resume and discuss job placement strategies.
